title: What's now???
content: We will start working on the projects listed in the project section. Our socials will be updated with our progress. We will roll out the product iteratively soon. You can join in on any of the projects, visit the project section for more info!

title: SOOOON...
content: We plan to get our internal ratings management and project allocation system up and ready as soon as possible. We have decided to outsource this project to fellow amritians. Check the projects section to join the development team ;)

title: LATERRRR~
content: We have montly developer meetings where we discuss the progress of the projects. These meetings will help the developers restrospect on their work and get valuable feedback.

title: /FARRR FUTURE/
content: We have a Bi-annual event which happens twice in a year, once during Amrita CBE's annual tech fest Anokha. It is to showcase the development of the ideas put forth by ideators.
